page.title: 14VILLAGE STUDY-EATON.
page.content: {POPULATION}IN 1871 THERE WERE 234 PEOPLE LIVING IN THE VILLAGE,DIVIDED INTO 47 FAMILIES.OF THESE 36 EARNED A LIVING FROM THE LAND,3 WERE CRAFTSMEN AND THE OTHER 8 FAMILIES EARNED THERE LIVING IN SOME OTHER WAY.THERE WAS ONLY ONE PROFESSIONAL PERSON LIVING IN THE VILLAGE. TODAY THE POPULATION OF EATON VILLAGE IS LESS THAN 100 PEOPLE AND THERE ARE ONLY THIRTY FAMILIES MOST OF THEM WITHOUT CHILDREN.ONLY FIVE OF THESE EARN THEIR LIVING FROM THE LAND.THE REMAINING PEOPLE ARE EITHER RETIRED (LIKE MR.CROOKS AN EX-PROFESSIONAL FOOTBALL PLAYER AND RETIRED HEADTEACHER) OR ARE PROFESSIONAL PEOPLE WHO WORK AWAY IN SUCH PLACES AS NOTTINGHAM,SHEFFIELD AND LINCOLN.
